comment.text: This translation key is used to display a loading message when an operation is in progress. It appears on various buttons, including confirm and continue buttons, as well as a registration form button, and is intended to provide visual feedback to the user that something is happening behind the scenes.

usage.context:
<Button
 id="forgot-password-modal_send"
 className="modal-dialog-button"
 key="ForgotSendBtn"
 label={
 isLoading ? t("Common:LoadingProcessing") : t("Common:SendButton")
 }
 size={ButtonSize.normal}
 scale
 primary
 onClick={onSendPasswordInstructions}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation "更新中..." translates to "Updating..." or "Refreshing...", which isn't a direct equivalent of "Loading...". While "更新中" can be used in situations where data is being loaded and updated, it's not the most accurate translation for a simple 'Loading...' message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "読み込み中..." (yomi-kachi-chuu...) which directly translates to "Loading..." or "ローディング..." (ro-dingu...) which is a loanword and often used for 'Loading...'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation 'Ielādē...' is an imperative form (command) meaning 'Load...'. The English 'Loading...' is a gerund functioning as a noun, indicating an ongoing process. A more accurate translation would be something like 'Notiek ielādes...' (Loading is happening...) or 'Lādēšana...' (Loading...).

The Sinhala translation "පූරණය වෙමින්..." translates to "Filling..." instead of "Loading...". While 'filling' can sometimes be synonymous with 'loading' in certain contexts, in this instance referring to data or a webpage, 'loading' is the more accurate and standard term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a translation closer to "බාගතමින්..." or "හොදවා ගැනෙමින්..." to better convey the meaning of 'Loading'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Учитавање…' while understandable, isn't the most natural or common rendering of 'Loading...' in Serbian. 'Учитавање' directly translates to 'Uploading', not 'Loading'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Приступање…' or 'Товарење…' which are more common and accurate translations of 'Loading...'
